-e ---

𒂅 𒂆 𒂇 𒂈 arm 𒁕 𒆏 𒀉 𒆷

𒂅 ≈ 𒈠 in 𒈠𒈾 mana 🪙 mina ≈ shekel #šiḳil
𒂅 ≈ 𒐈𒐺𒁹 ≈ 𒐈̲𒐺̲𒁹̲ ≈ 𒂆 𒂇 𒂈
𒂆 ≈ 𒂇 ≈ 𒁕 𒀉
𒂆 ≈ 𒌋𒂆 ≈ 𒀳 ≈ 𒌋𒁕

𒂅 𒂆 gin₂ "coin" gig̃₄ /gig̃/ /ging/ :

𒂅 SAĜ 𒂆 šiqlu “shekel”

𒂅 gín "chin" 𒂆 ⇔ çənə чана čana סַנְטֵר santér 𒅾 sum (chin)

𒂅 gín <> גַּרְזֶן garzen "axe"

𒂅 gín ≈ 𑜁𑜃𑜫 khan ຂວານ khuān կացին kacʻin 𒍏𒄩𒍣𒅔 ḫaṣṣinnu "axe"

𒂅 gín Klinge <> ცული culi

𒂅 TUN ṬU twin 2 Taueⁿ 𓍿 zwin 𒂆 𒂇

𒂅 TUN chin; "tongue": fringe l'PUŠ₄ lip

𒂅 TUN DÙN ذَقْن ḏaqn daʾn δin das Kinn chin 𒂅 gín 𒂆

𒂅 TUN gín ⇔ çənə чана čana סַנְטֵר santér SANKT:

𒂅 SAĜ sacred 𓂦 ⇔ 𓋹 sankh: 𒉺𒂅 ḪUR.SAĜ "sacred mountain" 𒉺 BERG

𒂅 𒂆 𒂇 GUNU forms 💡 𒂇 AGAⁿ ≈ ἀξίνη axínē axe 𒀉 A₂ arm

𒂅 TUN DUN₃ tañykãpy > ნიკაპი niḳaṗi 𓇋𓈖𓂝 | chin (𓂝 ⋆Carp!) ƒᵗin > ᵗin > chin

𒂅 PUŠ₄ ပုဆိန် pu.hcin 𒂅 π.gín "axe" балта balta 斧头 fǔtóu 𒂅 πṬU

𒂅 a [ARM] "arm; labor; wing; horn; side; strength; wage; power" #ahu ; idu •arm

𒂅 •Manu •Mount mentum (chin) menTUM namTUM

𒂅 ṭu ⇔ 𒂅 dextro dast 𓂧 < derechia = die Rechte = Right 𒂅 Ortho

𒂅 ⇔ right:
𒉺𒂅 •Berg ⋍ 𒄯𒊕 ḪUR.SAĜ "sacred mountain"

  1. 𒂅 SAĜ 𒂆 šiqlu Schekel, etwa 8,3 Gramm
  2. 𒍏𒂆 urud.gín : 𓋹 Kupfer Beil 𓈔𓈕
  3. 𒂆 = 𒂅 DÙN => 𒌉 DUMU 𒂅𒈬 : son 𓌢

Right 𒂆 arm 𒀉 derechia 𒁕 du5 𒂅 dextro

Charakteristische Wortkombinationen:

Piedmont valley wall 𒉺𒂅 ḪUR.SAĜ sacred mountain •Court

𒂅 𒆬𒌓 gín kù.babbar Schekel Silber
x 𒈠𒈾 y 𒂆 x Mine y Schekel
𒋻...𒂅...𒉌 Tar...dun...ni Tardunni son of Ikki, was a ruler of the Zagros mountains

𒂅 ⋍ 𓂝 in
𓇋 𓈖 𓂝 | chin | ចង្កា jonggaa ⋍ chin çənə чана čana סַנְטֵר santér 𒅾 sum چەناگە çenage ჩენგე čenge zenî Kinn ຄາງ khāng
𓇋 𓈖 𓂝 | chin | chīn 𓂝𓈖𓂝𓈖 ⋍ 𒂅𒂅 (cheiro) doubling
𓇋 𓈖 𓂝 | chin | bonbon (old) 𓂝𓈖𓂝𓈖
𓇋 𓈖 𓂝 | chin | ƒᵗin ذَقْن ḏaqn the.chin دقن daʾn 𒂅 tun ⇔ don 𓂞 𒁕
𓇋 𓈖 𓂝 | chin | ნიკაპი niḳaṗi (⋆Carp!) < tañykãpy! > ნუკუ nuḳu (Kinn reversed)
𓇋 𓈖 𓂝 | chin | ठोड़ी ṭhoṛī < feathern > turn 𒂅 tun

𒂆 AGA3 = 𒂅 gunu
